title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk on canvas ground
Technique: embroidery
description: Grid composition of three by five squares, each with a different geometric  pattern including diamonds, stripes and zigzags; worked in shades of black, brown, grey, light blue, light green, yellow, salmon-pink, and ivory. Bound on all four edges with ivory silk ribbon, with a bow at each corner.
name: Sampler
